scripts.build: pnpm run build:api-client && pnpm run build:family-tree && pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run generate-licenses
scripts.test: pnpm run test:family-tree && pnpm run test:frontend && pnpm run test:api-client
scripts.e2e:up: cross-env E2E_USER=admin E2E_PASS=adminpw concurrently -k -n server,frontend -c blue,magenta "node ./scripts/e2e-start.js --config server-rs/config.e2e.json" "pnpm -C packages/frontend run dev -- --port 5173"
scripts.e2e: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_E2E_USER=admin PLAYWRIGHT_E2E_PASS=adminpw PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://localhost:5173 pnpm -C packages/frontend run test:e2e
scripts.generate-licenses: cd packages/frontend && pnpm exec license-checker --production --json > ../../static/licenses-frontend.json && cd ../../server-rs && cargo license --json --all-features > ../static/licenses-backend.json && cd .. && node scripts/copy-licenses.js
